readingMnemonic: Who always makes <kanji>excuse</kanji> after excuse? <reading>Men</reading> (めん)! They have an excuse for everything. Why didn’t you take out the trash? Why did you forget my birthday? It’s just excuse after excuse with men. So I’ve heard, anyway.
meaningMnemonic: The <radical>excuse</radical> radical and the <kanji>excuse</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Dandy!
